info.author: Philip Pavlik ppavlik@memphis.edu
info.abstract: CopyCovariate performs a features addition process over a tab-delimited datafile. This component can effectively pass new produced features into the source datafile
info.details:
This compoment can pass the feature (Studentnumber) to the source datafile following each student' name autimatically. So the new output datafile is added with one more column that include the new feature.
Email the author directly with bug reports for this component.

inputs.b: A file with specific Studentnumber and Name.

outputs.b: A Tab-delimited file with added features
